name: Asteroids (itch) (richardypaloma)
description:
Inspirado en Asteroids (1979) de Atari y en Mine Storm (1982) de GCE.

Y reutilizando parte del código de Asteroids,  un salvapantallas multimonitor.

---

Inspired by Atari's Asteroids (1979) and GCE's Mine Storm (1982). 

And reusing part of the Asteroids code, a multi-monitor screensaver.
